hypothesis.explanation: The extracted hypothesis 'ACT subsidies increase the take-up of ACTs, but may lead to over-treatment.' is mostly similar to the reference hypothesis 'ACT [artemisinin combination therapies] subsidies induce take-up of ACT.' The core meaning is preserved, but the extracted hypothesis includes an additional aspect of over-treatment not explicitly mentioned in the reference.
